properties.script:
import urllib.parse
import sys
earliest = int(sys.argv[2]) - int(sys.argv[3])
latest = int(sys.argv[2]) + int(sys.argv[3])
raw_string = "%s earliest=%d latest=%d | head 1" % (sys.argv[1], earliest, latest)
safe_string = urllib.parse.quote(raw_string)

import json
import sys
#print(sys.argv[1])
newstr = sys.argv[1].replace('''\\\"''', '''\"''')
try:
    data = json.loads(newstr)
    data = json.dumps(data, indent=4)
except json.decoder.JSONDecodeError as err:
    data = newstr
#data = sys.argv[1].replace('''\\\"''', '''\"''')
